text: The Fiat 500L is a mini MPV made by Fiat. It is an MPV version of the Fiat 500. ==Details== The 500L was built in Serbia, a country in Europe, from 2012 to 2022. The 500L is 2 row, but there is a three-row version called '500L Living'. 'L' in 500L stands for Large. This MPV can carry either 5 or 7 people. Category:Hatchbacks Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles
title: Fiat 500L
